body: noice..but pretty much every chemistry is dumpster fire

So two different guys 0, 5, 6 for the coworker. Then 1 2 3 4 (7) for the cousin that he sleeps with. 
Also there is a threesome with kuro gyaru which is the sister of the main girl, that is a threesome with the two sisters and their cousin.
So he's the father right or not.......???

@maru3 Thank you because after reading what @zombieadd commented I got really confused. I knew those were two different people but that comment had me thinking I was going crazy and had me read the story all over again. I guess "It really was hard for @zombieadd despite the fact that they were actually paying attention."

@zombieadd : Takako call's him Hiroyuki in ep5. It seems that it's Usami Hiroyuki, who is the MC of episode 0, 5 and 6. Katsuya (family name not mentioned) is Tomo's brother who crushes on Andou Mika/Miki.

@zombieadd I'm confused was that girl who tried to smoke with MC at the end of chapter 0 Mika or a totally different girl. If it is, why does she talk like she never met Mc if that is her cousin? The only reason I think this is because Mika talks about meeting a guy smoking on the roof that has an ex-girlfriend which sounds exactly like Mc from chapter 0.
Who knows my ass.This guy just got tricked to raised someone else child.Garbage.Slut flag my guy.

@sannianqibu: It's really not that hard if you actually paid attention: MC is Usami Katsuya, little girl (MC's lil sis) is Tomo-chan, Ep 0 and 6's girl is Takako, Ep 1's girl is Mika (but MC calls her Miki-nee(?) a misspelling?), Ep 2's girl is Yumi who is MC fuck buddy, Ep 3's dark skin girl is Emi who is also Yumi's sister, Saita is the male coworker. Ep 5's girl is Andou-san who is MC's coworker.
What the hell is this? War and Peace? I can't keep track of all the characters, damn.
Glad to know he's got a son!
good shit we getting close to the end
